alert.note: Alert for Clark; Clay; Crawford; Cumberland; Effingham; Jasper; Lawrence; Richland (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 24 at 3:46AM CST until February 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Snow accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Along and south of I-70. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact both the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing drizzle will create a thin glaze of ice early this morning. The precipitation will come to an end after sunrise, then will re-develop this afternoon. A mix of freezing rain and sleet is expected by mid to late afternoon, with some snow mix in during the evening before coming to an end.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
